title.narrative: 1.2 SOCIAL PROTECTION SYSTEM

description.narrative: 1.2 The Government has the capacity to operationalize an integrated child-sensitive and shock-responsive social protection system. , which contributes to Access To Inclusive Social Protection, Access To Inclusive Social Protection (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2025, the most vulnerable children and youth benefit from policy coherence, evidence-based and inclusive decision-making and financing for social development in line with the national SDGs and international standards.

title.narrative: 1.2 The Government has the capacity to operationalize an integrated child-sensitive and shock-responsive social protection system.

description.narrative: UNICEF’s technical;assistance;to;support;Ministry;of Finance in;enhancing;the Single Registry of Social Protection;resulted in;doubling;the number of;families receiving cash;benefits;from 600, 000 to 1.2;mln.;;As estimated,;550,000;additional;children from low-income;families;started receiving benefits;thanks to UNICEF’s;advocacy.;;The;modelling exercise;of community-based social services;provided through;case management;has been;launched.;;In total 106 families were assessed.;;192;children (101 boys and 91 girls);benefited;from the service,;including 12 children with;disabilities,;(8;boys and 4 girls).;; | Status:On-track | As-of Date:14/01/2022
